name: Chicken Expert
description: Win 10 Solo Classic matches in the Platinum tier or higher, with each final kill made using a different weapon type.

rewards.title: Chicken Expert
rewards.extra: Achievement Points and possible in-game rewards

tipsTricks.heading: Plan Ahead
tipsTricks.description: Before the final circle, ensure you have the specific weapon type needed for the final kill. Carry multiple weapons or loot specific items accordingly.

tipsTricks.heading: Weaken the Final Opponent
tipsTricks.description: For harder kills like Melee or Crossbow, weaken the last enemy with other weapons before switching to the required weapon for the final blow.

tipsTricks.heading: Utilize Bots
tipsTricks.description: Lower-tier matches may have bot opponents, making it easier to secure kills with less conventional weapons.

tipsTricks.heading: Track Your Progress
tipsTricks.description: Keep a record of which weapon types you've used for final kills to ensure all categories are covered.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay in Platinum Tier or Higher
tipsTricks.description: Make sure your rank remains in the Platinum tier or above, as dropping below will halt your progress toward this achievement.

tipsTricks.heading: Prioritize Easier Weapons First
tipsTricks.description: Start with familiar weapons like ARs or SMGs, and save the challenging ones, like Melee or Crossbow, for later matches.

tipsTricks.heading: Adapt Your Strategy
tipsTricks.description: Adjust your approach depending on the weapon needed. For vehicle kills, for example, fight in open areas to run over the final enemy.

tipsTricks.heading: Stay Patient and Persistent
tipsTricks.description: This achievement requires skill and patience. Learn from each match and refine your strategy.

requirements.heading: Final Kill with SMG
requirements.description: Secure the final kill using an SMG, such as UMP45, UZI, or Vector.
